name: Bryce 7 Scene File
summary: Learn about .BR7 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Bryce 7 scenes are used for exporting wallpapers, digital art, game models, and other 3D graphics. The objects in Bryce 7 scenes can be exported and opened in DAZ 3D Studio.
NOTE: Previous versions of Bryce use the extensions .BR6, .BR5, and .BR4.

description: 3D scene file created by Bryce 7, a 3D modeling application; often includes environmental elements such as water, terrain, trees, leaves, and skies, but can also 3D models such as humans and animals; may also contain lighting properties and other visual effects.
